name: Ampharos
flavorText: The tip of its tail shines brightly. In the olden days, people sent signals using the tail's light.
Ability1Text: After your opponent plays a Supporter card from his or her hand, put 1 damage counter on each of your opponent's Pokemon. You can't use more than 1 Jamming Poke-Body each turn.
Attack1Text: You may discard all Lightning Energy attached to Ampharos. If you do, this attack does 20 damage to each of your opponent's Benched Pokemon that has any Energy cards attached to it. (Don't apply Weakness and Resistance for Benched Pokemon.)

name: Gallade
flavorText: A master of courtesy and swordsmanship, it fights using extending swords on it elbows.
Attack1Text: Put damage counters on the Defending Pokemon until it is 50 HP away from being Knocked Out. If you do, your opponent switches the Defending Pokemon with 1 of his or her Benched Pokemon.
Attack2Text: You may choose as many of your face-down Prize cards as you like and put them face up. If you do, this attack does 60 damage plus 20 more damage for each Prize card you chose. (These cards remain face up for the rest of the game.)

name: Latias
flavorText: Its body is covered with a down that can refract light in such a way that it becomes invisible.
Attack1Text: Remove 2 damage counters and all Special Conditions from Latias.
Attack2Text: Discard a Fire and a Water Energy attached to Latias.

name: Latios
flavorText: A highly intelligent Pokemon. By folding back its wings in flight, it can overtake jet planes.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for a basic Energy card and attach it to Latios. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Mothim
flavorText: It loves the honey of flowers and steals honey collected by COMBEE.
Attack1Text: During your next turn, if an attack does damage to the Defending Pokemon (after applying Weakness and Resistance), that attack does 40 more damage.
Attack2Text: If Mothim has any damage counters on it, this attack does 30 damage plus 40 more damage.

name: Delibird
flavorText: It carries food rolled up in its tail. It has the habit of sharing food with people lost in mountains.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, search your deck for any 1 card and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Flaaffy
flavorText: If its coat becomes fully charged with electricity, its tail lights up. It fire hair that zaps on impact.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Lightning Energy card and attach it to 1 of your Pokemon. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If tails, Flaaffy does 10 damage to itself.

name: Kirlia
flavorText: It is highly perceptive of its Trainer's feelings. It dances when it is feeling happy.
Attack1Text: Search your discard pile for a Supporter card and use the effect of that card as the effect of this attack. (The Supporter card remains in your discard pile.)
Attack2Text: Choose 1 of your opponent's Pokemon. This attack does 40 damage to that Pokemon. This attack's damage isn't affected by Weakness or Resistance.

name: Stantler
flavorText: Staring at its antlers creates an odd sensation as if one were being drawn into their centers.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for a Supporter card, show it to your opponent, and put it into your hand. Shuffle your deck afterward.
Attack2Text: If the Defending Pokemon isn't an Evolved Pokemon, that Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Wormadam Sandy Cloak
flavorText: When BURMY evolved, it cloak became a part of this Pokemon's body. The cloak is never shed.
Ability1Text: Prevent all effects, excluding damage, done to Wormadam Sandy Cloak.
Attack1Text: Does 40 damage plus 10 more damage for each Fighting Energy attached to Wormadam Sandy Cloak.

name: Burmy Plant Cloak
flavorText: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Plant Cloak is your Active Pokemon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Grass Energy card and attach it to Burmy Plant Cloak.
Attack1Text: If Burmy Plant Cloak has any Grass Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Burmy Sandy Cloak
flavorText: To shelter itself from cold, wintry winds, it covers itself with a cloak made of twigs and leaves.
Ability1Text: Once during your turn (before your attack), if Burmy Sandy Cloak is your Active Pokemon, you may search your discard pile for a basic Fighting Energy card and attach it to Burmy Sandy Cloak.
Attack1Text: If Burmy Sandy Cloak has any Fighting Energy attached to it, this attack does 10 damage plus 10 more damage.

name: Corsola
flavorText: Many live in the clean seas of the south. They apparently can't live in polluted waters.
Attack1Text: Search your deck for up to 3 different types of Basic Pokemon and put them onto your Bench. Shuffle your deck afterward.

name: Mareep
flavorText: Its fluffy coat swells to double when static electricity builds up. Touching it can be shocking.
Attack1Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Paralyzed.

name: Ralts
flavorText: It uses the horns on its head to sense human emotions. It is said to appear in front of cheerful people.
Attack2Text: Flip a coin. If heads, the Defending Pokemon is now Confused.

name: Sentret
flavorText: It has a very nervous nature. It stands up high on its tail so it can scan wide areas.
Attack1Text: Look at the top 2 cards of your deck, choose 1 of them, and put it into your hand. Put the other card on the bottom of your deck.

name: Spinda
flavorText: No two SPINDA have the same pattern of spots. Its tottering step fouls the aim of foes.
Attack1Text: Draw a card from the top and the bottom of your deck.
Attack2Text: If any basic Energy card attached to Spinda is the same type as any Energy attached to the Defending Pokemon, this attack does 10 damage plus 30 more damage.
